Posts.Content: Katee1 wrote: What a last 24 hours...  Last night I ended up in the emergency room for what ended up being a winged scapula/nerve damage on my right side (same side as the breast w/ micro calc cluster) and didn't get home and to bed until about 1:30am. This morning at 9:15am I was back at the hospital having a biopsy on a mass on the other breast, which the dr said looks like it will come back b9!    She said she'd call me Thurs or Fri latest with the results. Meanwhile, I am not supposed to use -either- arm, so I'm limiting my typing today - lol - //only bright side is husband gets to do the chores.  ;-) So..... I'll let you all know what I hear on Thurs/Fri (I'm a little more scared for my shoulder and dodgy huge knot size lymph node on same size... I'm seeing gyno on the lymph-node and any other clinical but not biopsied findings from the report and have to see a neurologist about the shoulder -which looks really horrible by the way -eek) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Had my biopsy today... Katee1 Katee1

Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2013 08:41PM Katee1 wrote: Thank you so much.  No word yet.  I called an ortho surgeon today re: the shoulder and they're getting me in tomorrow.  I think I'm more scared about that -eek for several reasons.   Breast-wise, I should also get my biopsy results tomorrow -Friday at the latest...so it will be an eventful couple days leading up to the weekend.  I'll let you all know how it goes.......o.0
Posts.Title: Had my biopsy today... Katee1 Katee1
